title: Hovenweep National Monument: Publications
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Publications            Publications       Geology [234k PDF file] An introduction to the geology of Hovenweep. Fits on letter-size paper.   Little Ruin Canyon Trail Guide [750k PDF file] An introduction to the features along this popular trail.   Plants [268k PDF file] An overview of the landscape and plant communities of Hovenweep. Fits on letter-size paper.   Visitor Guide [900k PDF file] An introduction to the features of Hovenweep. Two pages, legal-sized.   Wildlife [116k PDF file] An introduction to the animals you're likely to see at Hovenweep. Fits on letter-size paper.    Junior Ranger Booklet [5mb PDF file] Filled with fun activities, this 16-page booklet reveals the wonders of Hovenweep to kids and parents alike.
